quotes.quote: Certainty always produces questions, uncertainty statements. It is a balancing law of nature.
The quest for certainty in forecasting outcomes can be the enemy of progress.
Certainty ends inquiry.
The one unchangeable certainty is that nothing is certain or unchangeable.
The certainty within our spirit made the dream reality.
Just because someone seems to have more certainty, doesn't mean they're right.
It is the essence of certainty to be established only with reservations.
Life is ever evolving. The only certainty is change.
The only certainty about following the crowd is that you will all get there together.
The demand for certainty is one which is natural to man, but is nevertheless an intellectual vice.
People who need certainty are unlikely to make good entrepreneurs.
Certainty is usually a sign of pathology.
Nothing consoles and comforts like certainty does.
Certainty is the mother of quiet and repose, and uncertainty the cause of variance and contentions.
Certainty is a cruel mindset. It hardens our minds against possibility.
What is certainty but the refuge of those whose faith is not strong enough to entertain doubt.
Certainty sees things in restrictive, protective, aggressive ways, and thus isn't seeing at all.
Certainty, not data, is knowledge.
Certainty is the most vivid condition of ignorance and the most necessay condition for knowledge.
Doubt is long-winded. Certainty is brief.
Certainty is no guarantor of correctness.
The lack of faith is not doubt. It is certainty.
Incompetence is certainty in the absence of expertise. Overconfidence is certainty in the presence of expertise.
Certainty is missing the point entirely.
Certainty is the enemy of change.
To believe with certainty, we must begin with doubting.
Logic is the foundation of the certainty of all the knowledge we acquire.
Certainty a strange Ferris wheel of a statement!
Such certainty is beautiful, but uncertainty is more beautiful still.
Certainty without power can be interesting, even amusing. Certainty with power can be dangerous.
Certainty generally is illusion, and repose is not the destiny of man.
People prefer the certainty of misery to the misery of uncertainty.
Certainty abolishes hope, and robs us of renewal.
Tolerance grows only when faith loses certainty; certainty is murderous.
It is the certainty that you are about to recover, that brings results, not the hope.
Facts matter not at all. Perception is everything. It's certainty.
Certainty is the mother of repose, and therefore the common law aims at certainty.
The only certainty is that nothing is certain.
We often call a certainty a hope, to bring it luck.
Certainty is a closing of the mind. To create something new you must have doubt.
One of the few certainties in life is that persons of certainty should certainly be avoided.
What men want is not knowledge, but certainty.
The certainty that everything has already been written annuls us, or renders us phantasmal.
Not doubt, certainty is what drives one insane.
Moral certainty is never more than probability.
It's good to have some certainty in life, even if it's only that I'm in deep trouble.
Certainty is an unrealistic and unattainable ideal.
It is far better to foresee even without certainty than not to foresee at all.
